item.title: ~~=====? The xp chance command ?===~~
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

on my testscape server i have a command to chance xp but i dont know how it works, i need to say ::addxp and than here something but i dunno what
this is the code into my client.java its [glow=red,2,300]testscape![/glow]

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“addxp”)
{
try
{
int skillIndex = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6,8));
int skillExp = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9));

				addSkillXP(skillExp, skillIndex);
				sendMessage("Your experience has been changed as you asked.");
				//println_debug("Index:"+skillIndex+" XP: "+skillExp+""); 

			}
			catch(Exception e) {sendMessage("You messed up the command, try again");}[/code]

[br][size=1]Posted at: July 27, 2006, 03:45:39 PM[/size][hr]any1 knows how it works?

Read full topic
